# gx-anchor

## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | Type                         | Default         |
| --------------- | ---------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------- | --------------- |
| `cssClass`      | `css-class`      | A CSS class to set as the `gx-anchor` element class.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | `string`                     | `undefined`     |
| `disabled`      | `disabled`       | This attribute lets you specify if the element is disabled. If disabled, it will not fire any user interaction related event (for example, click event).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | `boolean`                    | `false`         |
| `highlightable` | `highlightable`  | True to highlight control when an action is fired.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `boolean`                    | `true`          |
| `href`          | `href`           | This attribute lets you specify an URL.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | `string`                     | `""`            |
| `invisibleMode` | `invisible-mode` | This attribute lets you specify how this element will behave when hidden. \| Value \| Details \| \| ------------ \| --------------------------------------------------------------------------- \| \| `keep-space` \| The element remains in the document flow, and it does occupy space. \| \| `collapse` \| The element is removed form the document flow, and it doesn't occupy space. \| | `"collapse" \| "keep-space"` | `"collapse"`    |
| `target`        | `target`         | This attribute lets you specify where to display the linked URL.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `"current-tab" \| "new-tab"` | `"current-tab"` |
